title: Contusion
description: Facing my own mortality, I take a stranger to bed so I can feel alive. I’m in a foreign country and will never see him again, so what’s the harm?The only thing worse than cancer at twenty-four is having to keep it a secret.Worse still is trading knuckle wraps for head scarfs and mouth guards for IV drips.Like I sought the best coach, my search for the best cancer researchers lands me in Kansas City, far from home and alone.But when I take the handsome and funny Rory Dennis home, I learn there is more between us than an insatiable physical attraction.I want to see him again, but can I keep my illness a secret from yet another person?This steamy, sports romance has a wonderful happily ever after and is perfect for fans of Mariana Zapata, Alexis Daria, and TL Swan.
author: Ofelia Martinez
